snippet: The report added to mixed signals about whether China was starting to recover from its deepest downturn since the 2008 global financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The report added to mixed signals about whether China was starting to recover from its deepest downturn since the 2008 global financial crisis.

headline.seo: Chinese Manufacturing Contracted in August, Report Shows
headline.main: Report Shows Chinese Manufacturing Contracted in August
headline.print_headline: Report Shows Chinese Manufacturing Contracted in August
